FuncDef: The reset radius statistics packet command clears statistics about packets exchanged with RADIUS servers.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To obtain the accurate statistics about packets on the RADIUS server for a certain period, run the reset radius statistics packet command to clear the statistics for that period and then start statistics collection.
Configuration Impact
The reset radius statistics packet command clears statistics about packets on the RADIUS server.
Follow-up Procedure
After running the reset radius statistics packet command to clear the previous statistics, use the display radius-server packet command to view packet matching statistics in the current period.
Precautions
Cleared RADIUS packet statistics cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running the reset radius statistics packet command.
After the reset radius statistics packet command is executed, the system does not prompt you the statistics deletion.
